```py
import numpy

class A(Base):
    __tablename__ = "a"

    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    data = Column(Integer)

# .. later
session.add(A(data=numpy.int64(10)))
session.commit()
```

```py
>>> import numpy
>>> from sqlalchemy import column, Integer
>>> print(column("x", Integer) == numpy.int64(10))  # works
x  =  :x_1
>>> print(numpy.int64(10) == column("x", Integer))  # breaks
False
```

```py
data = numpy.int64(10)

session.add(A(data=int(data)))

result = session.execute(select(A.data).where(int(data) == A.data))

session.commit()
```

```py
import numpy

class A(Base):
    __tablename__ = "a"

    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    data = Column(Integer)

# .. later
session.add(A(data=numpy.int64(10)))
session.commit()
```

```py
>>> import numpy
>>> from sqlalchemy import column, Integer
>>> print(column("x", Integer) == numpy.int64(10))  # works
x  =  :x_1
>>> print(numpy.int64(10) == column("x", Integer))  # breaks
False
```

```py
data = numpy.int64(10)

session.add(A(data=int(data)))

result = session.execute(select(A.data).where(int(data) == A.data))

session.commit()
```
